description: Listing products filtered by multiple categories and price lesser/greater than or eq to

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: List of categories to be filtered by as comma separated values

parameters.name: price_lte
parameters.description: Price lesser than or equal to

parameters.name: price_gte
parameters.description: Price greater than or equal to

requests.response_body:
[
  {
    "id": 271,
    "name": "Input Amplifier",
    "category": "makeup",
    "price": "18.99 USD",
    "sale_price": "18.28 USD",
    "under_sale": true,
    "sold_out": false,
    "created_at": "less than a minute",
    "updated_at": "less than a minute"
  }
]
